name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Wikipedia for high resolution screens

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make articles on Wikipedia easier readable by having an optimal line length on high resolution and ultrawide screens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wikipedia webpage is not optimized for high resolution and ultra widescreens. Article line length get very long, this makes reading lines more difficult. This extension fixes this by setting an optimal line length for every article.
